pageProduct.name: Vital Vegan Pea Pea & Hemp Powder Blend Vanilla 500g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Naturally Occurring Pea Protein Isolate If you’re looking for a protein supplement to help your body function at its best, you can rely on Vital Protein Powder. It contains over 18 amino acids, matching the profile of whey proteins which is unique for a vegetable protein. The protein is extracted from the highest quality European golden peas. This complete protein digests easily without causing bloating. Our vegan protein powder comes in three delicious flavours and an unflavoured option.

Warnings

Warnings Vitamin supplements should not replace a healthy diet.

Common Uses

Suitable for exercise recovery, snack replacement, and those looking to increase their dietary intake of protein. Vegans, vegetarians, those sensitive to dairy products, the elderly, immune-compromised and people who exercise a lot are particularly at risk of developing a protein deficiency, and should add a pea protein isolate supplement to their diets to make sure they’re getting enough of this life-giving nutrient.

Ingredients

70% Vital Protein Vanilla (Pure Pea Protein Isolate, Natural Vanilla Flavour, Thaumatin & Monk Fruit); 30% Hemp Protein Powder NUTRITION INFORMATION: SERVINGS PER PACKAGE: 20 SERVING SIZE: 25G Average Quantity Per Serving Average Quantity Per 100g Energy 410.9kJ 1643.6kJ Protein 18.7 74.7 Fat, total 2.2g 8.6g - Saturated 0.3g 1.2g Carbohydrates 4.5g 17.8g - Sugars 0.5g 2.1g Sodium 229.9mg 919.7mg Fatty Acid Profile: Average Quantity Per Serving Average Quantity Per 100g Linoleic acid (LA) (oMEGA 6) 681mg 2.72g Alpha linolenic acid (Omega 3) 0.87g 0.87g Oleic acid (Omega 9) 128.25mg 0.51g Palmitic acid 99.75mg 0.40g Gamma linolenic acid (GLA) (Omega 6) 39.75mg 0.16g Stearic acid C18:1 cis isomers 13.5mg 0.05g Stearidonic acid (SDA) (Omega 3) 12.75mg 0.05g Arachidonia acid 12mg 0.05g Eicosadienoic acid 8.25mg 0.03g Behenic acid 5.25mg 0.02g Lignoceric acid 2.25mg 0.01g

Directions

Dosage:Disolve or mix 2 heaped tablespoons (25g) into 200ml of water, milk (non dairy is suggested), yoghurt, or natural juice of your choice. C Consume 1-2 times per day depending on how much protein is advised to have in your diet. Always consult with a healthcare practitioner as individual needs may vary.
